Module org.dellroad.hl7
Package org.dellroad.hl7.io

Class HL7FileWriter

java.lang.Object
org.dellroad.hl7.io.HL7FileWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, AutoCloseable, HL7Writer
public class HL7FileWriter extends Object implements HL7Writer, Closeable
Writes out HL7 messages in "file format".

Each segment is terminated with LF, and a blank line is added between messages.
